items.title: Steelers escape Ravens' late push, win AFC North title
items.description: In a rock fight that morphed into a fourth-quarter track meet, Pittsburgh edges Baltimore to advance.

items.title: Barnwell makes his NFL award picks: Ranking candidates for MVP, Rookie of the Year, more
items.description: Drake Maye or Matthew Stafford for MVP? Which rookies should earn hardware? And no one is beating out Myles Garrett for DPOY, right?

items.title: FCS national championship preview: Illinois State, Montana State starving for title
items.description: Will the Bobcats break through or can the Redbirds cap their amazing run in style?

items.title: Sack records: Garrett makes history; Broncos' D four shy of team record
items.description: The Browns' vet edge rusher breaks the single-season sack record, and the Broncos' defense comes up short.

items.title: Tracking NFL coaching changes: Four openings after the Browns and Falcons make changes
items.description: The Browns fired Kevin Stefanski after six seasons with the team. There are now four head coach openings around the NFL. Here's what to know.
